name: XO Protocol
description: XO is a next-generation social discovery platform powered by AI and blockchain. Designed for Gen Z, XO combines Proof of Personhood (PoP), decentralized identity (DID), and AI Agent companionship to create a secure and emotionally engaging social experience. With 1.5M+ downloads, 100K monthly active users, and over 7M transactions on Cyber, XO ensures authentic connections while minimizing fraud and catfishing. Users can earn $XO tokens through meaningful interactions, tipping, and content creation, fostering a thriving creator economy. Backed by industry leaders like Rakuten, Techstars, and Cyber, XO is redefining how people connect in the Web3 era.
